pdf-element
Polymer 1.0 component to render PDF Demo Github

pdf-element

Web component built with Polymer which allows to view PDF files.

This component based on similar component by Roman
Liutikov.

Features

  • Next/Previous page
  • Zoom
  • Download
  • Compatible with Polymer 1.0.
  • Looks nice :)

Installation

git clone https://github.com/streetturtle/pdf-element.git
cd ./pdf-element
gulp serve
